name: LitMan Level Seventy Eight
description:
[b]Thank You and Goodbye![/b]

It was a pleasurable experience. I loved what I were doing and remember everyone who was together. There was a good days and a bad ones. Together we shared the passion to this game. But everything has its own end. My modding is not the exception.

I want to say big Thank You to all of those who supported me all the way.

[b]This is latest planned update. Dev Kit Version 144536.21789.[/b] I may resume updating my Mods in the future but no promises. 

All Source files is published on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods

[quote]Days I'm Modding Conan Exiles: 932 days or 2 years, 6 months, 18 days

Mods Released: 19
Mods Updates: 837
Followers: 382
Total Unique Visitors: 371154
Current Subscribers: 231707
Total Unique Subscribers: 322244
Current Favorites: 8817
Total Unique Favorites: 10501
Positive Ratings: 2752
Negative ratings: 70[/quote]

Up to Level 78.

Original Stats:
60 Levels
19 132 275 XP
390 Attribute Points
497 Feats

Modded Stats:
78 Levels
41 793 982 XP
648 Attribute Points
788 Feats

Does not work with "LitMan Level One Fifty Six".

It is safe to replace this Mod with "LitMan Level One Fifty Six". 

[quote]IMPORTANT: This Mod increases Level needed to open Legendary Chests to 78. If you want to be able open Legendary Chests from Level 1 you could use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1367028501]LitMan Loot Legendary Chests[/url].[/quote]

Support Channel on Discord: https://discord.gg/yqvQm6B

If you liked my Mods feel free to Donate on Paypal https://www.paypal.me/kasperaitis.

Mod ID: 888023436
changeNote:
